thread.section_title: Vapornation Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Vapornation | vapornation.com | 5 of 90
thread.title: Tom Chatterton

author: Tom Chatterton
title: Tom Chatterton
text: I love shopping with Vapor Nation - quick service and great discounts that you can't get anywhere else. My new RA Kiln came safely & discreetly packaged. And I sure can't gripe about the cost. I looked everywhere to see if I could beat their price. I couldn't. But even if I did find somewhere with a better price, I wouldn't trust them the way I do Vapor Nation. I've bought from them before both through Amazon & through their website. Couldn't be happier!
